Name: My Furry Maid üêæ
About the game: / STORY Okay, to be fair - we don't have a real made here, but we have a hot actress who wants to be one! And she wears a maid costume anyway, so who cares? My Furry Maid is a kinetic novel about a guy who works as a teacher in a housekeeping school and his new student Anna. She wants to study maid classes for a role in a TV-Show, so he'll have to teach her etiquette, housing and cooking for a whole week. How long will she last until falling in love with him? Let's find out! (And, as usual for 'My Furry' series - we have a little bit of drama, serious topics and 'slice of life' stuff). FEATURES ‚Ä¢ About 1,5 hours of content ‚Ä¢ Exciting story ‚Ä¢ HD fully original artworks ‚Ä¢ Cute cat maid!
